name: JavaVisualNovel
tagline: A Java framework for creating visual novels.
body:
### About
JVN is a framework to create visual novels easily and quickly base on libGDX. It is currently not script based, nor is it a library. You currently must write your code directly inside the JVN project which sort of turns this into a template. Currently only a debug console is implemented.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
